channel.title: Elixir on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: [Quote] You Can Think of Any Web Server as a Function
item.description: “You can think of any web server as a function. Each time you type a URL, think of it as a function call to some remote server. That function takes your request and generates some response. A web server is a natural problem for a functional language to solve.” Excerpt From Programming Phoenix by Chris McCord Buy on Amazon @media (max-width: 640px) { .embed-image { min-width: 100%; } } Programming Phoenix Don’t accept the compromise between fast and beautiful: you can have it all.
